parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Tire tread separation can lead to loss of vehicle control, accidents, and potentially serious injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: while driving; sudden loss of tire pressure; vibration or shaking of the vehicle; and difficulty steering or maintaining control of the vehicle.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Drive Line Issues (Too Long Drive Line)
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: A too long drive line can cause the drive train to bottom out, leading to damage to the transfer case and transmission, which can result in loss of control, accidents, or strand the driver.
symptoms: Feeling of the drive line coming through the floor pan
grinding noise when leaving stop lights
transfer case locking into drive with extreme breaking sound

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Loose bolts in the steering wheel can cause the steering wheel to break loose, leading to loss of control and accidents.
Failure of the transmission and transfer case can cause loss of control, accidents, or leave the driver stranded.
symptoms: transfer case locking into drive with extreme breaking sound

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The lack of a pressure relief valve in the engine cooling system can cause the plastic fill bottle to explode if the engine overheats, potentially leading to engine damage, coolant leakage, and increased risk of accidents.
The failure of the serpentine idler pulley bearing can cause the belt to malfunction, leading to engine overheating, loss of power steering, and increased risk of accidents.
symptoms: Squealing or grinding noise from the serpentine belt area
